extractedData.name: Divya Salomon
extractedData.title: Software Engineer
extractedData.summary: Results-driven .NET Developer with over 4.5 years of hands-on experience in developing and maintaining scalable applications using the .NET framework. Adept at building robust backend solutions complemented by 1 year of practical experience in React.js for modern, responsive front-end development. Proven ability to translate business requirements into efficient technical solutions.
